T11dhksparu:81: 00001 pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
T11dhksparu:82: 00001 tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
T11dhksparu:83: 00002 rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhksparu:84: 00002 tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
T11dhksparu:85: 00003 para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
T11dhksparu:86: 00003 saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
T11dhksparu:88: 00004 kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
T11dhksparu:89: 00005 tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
T11dhksparu:90: 00005 ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
T11dhksparu:94: 00007 prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
T11dhksparu:96: 00008 tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
T11dhksparu:97: 00009 yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
T11dhksparu:98: 00009 upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
T11dhksparu:101: 00011 dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
T11dhksparu:103: 00012 yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
T11dhksparu:104: 00012 bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
T11dhksparu:106: 00013 apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
T11dhksparu:111: 00016 bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
T11dhksparu:114: 00017 vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva
T11dhksparu:115: 00018 bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
T11dhksparu:116: 00018 bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
T11dhksparu:118: 00019 anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
T11dhksparu:119: 00020 janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
T11dhksparu:120: 00020 samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
T11dhksparu:121: 00021 tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
T11dhksparu:122: 00021 sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
T11dhksparu:123: 00022 saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
T11dhksparu:125: 00023 saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
T11dhksparu:129: 00025 teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
